description: The Pathos 28 daypack combines 28 liters of storage with a feature-set built for a day on the move. An internal organizer and electronics sleeve keeps your work gear secure while two external stretchy side pockets hold water bottles, climbing shoes or any other gear needed for when work ends, and the fun begins. The front mounted daisy chain gives you more attachment options and the main pack body is built from 100% recycled fabrics.
name: Pathos 28 Backpack
